sentences: On technology transfer, it proposes the establishment of an intergovernmental consultative group of technical and scientific experts under SBSTA on the basis of equal geographical distribution.

This group would advise SBSTA on further actions, focus on means of addressing the identified barriers to technology transfer and facilitate information exchange and review by creating a clearinghouse and regional technology centers.
SBSTA would review the group's work on a regular basis and if necessary request the COP to take any further actions.
enb_long_title: Sixth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
